entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who is being addressed by Harry and Lupin in this conversation. She is described as shouting and screaming at Lupin.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who is being shouted at by Harry and Hermione. He is described as calm but pale.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is shouting at Lupin and feeling furious. He is described as trusting Lupin.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who is mentioned by Lupin as his friend. He is also mentioned by Hermione as someone that Lupin has been helping get into the castle.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a person who is mentioned by Hermione as someone that Lupin has been helping to get into the castle. He wants Harry dead.

relationships.description: Harry trusted Lupin, but now he is furious with him.
Hermione warns Harry not to trust Lupin because she thinks he is helping Black get into the castle.
Lupin says that he is now friends with Sirius, but Hermione disputes this.
Hermione accuses Lupin of helping Black get into the castle.
